messages.title: Keith Angus
messages.content: A strong voice for Islington North

messages.title: BREXIT: Who will speak up for you?
messages.content: This election is a huge opportunity for the people of Islington North. The Liberal Democrats are the only party campaigning to stop Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for an Education for All
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keith Angus will ensure funding for local schools, reduce class sizes and balance the academic curriculum to prepare students for life.
There is a housing crisis in Islington with more people renting or buying at inflated prices. Keith Angus plans to tackle this by reforming the rental market and introducing thousands of new homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect Our Health and Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keith Angus aims to protect our NHS by reducing waste, supporting mental health services, and integrating health and social care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only local Lib Dem Keith Angus can beat Jeremy Corbyn

issues.brexitEurope: BREXIT: Who will speak up for you?
issues.economy: Islington Labour MPs voted for Brexit, impacting local jobs and businesses.
issues.education: Fighting for an Education for All
issues.health: Protect Our Health and Social Care
